attributes.action: The use of financial privilege for the Welfare Reform Bill 2012
attributes.additional_details:
The use of financial privilege with regard to the welfare Reform Bill 2012, will deny the democratic process of  full discussion and debate of this proposed piece legislation, including the amendements propsed in the House of Lords. This bill in its present form, will make the lives of make the lives of the sick and disabled a misery, with the presumption that they are faking their conditions, which is far from the truth.
The vulnerable of this democratic country deserve to be treated better than this.
